title: Startups scramble to meet payroll, pay bills after SVB's swift collapse
description: Tech companies that banked at SVB are wondering when they're going to be able to pay employees and their bills after Friday's collapse.

title: Here's how the second biggest bank collapse in U.S. history happened in just 48 hours
description: As dust begins to settle on the biggest American bank failure since 2008, members of the VC community lament the role other investors played in SVB's demise.

title: Wage growth is cooling — but workers still have bargaining power, economists say
description: The Federal Reserve is trying to rein in historically high wage growth to tame inflation. Overall, the job market remains hot for workers, economists said.

title: Crypto bank Signature slides on Friday amid troubles at Silicon Valley Bank, Silvergate
description: Signature Bank shares dropped as much as 32% on Friday and were halted amid a sell-off in bank stocks that continued for a second day.

title: Just like that: Market pricing swings back to quarter-point Fed rate hike
description: One bank implosion and a cooperative jobs report later, and the market has changed its mind.

title: Fintech startup Brex got billions of dollars in Silicon Valley Bank deposits Thursday, source says
description: Companies including JPMorgan Chase, Morgan Stanley and First Republic have also seen heightened inflows Thursday as SVB's stock tanked.

title: Silicon Valley Bank is shut down by regulators, FDIC to protect insured deposits
description: The tech-focused bank was closed by regulators on Friday after attempts to raise more capital failed.

title: First Republic leads regional bank rout as Silicon Valley Bank failure raises fears about bond losses
description: The declines on Friday were building on large sell-off from Thursday.

title: Treasury yields post big decline as investors make a flight to safety of bonds
description: Treasury yields fell Friday as worries over regional bank SVB Financial's sparked a flight to safer assets such as government bonds.

title: 31% of new cars sold for above sticker price last month. These 10 models have the biggest premiums
description: Even though new car buyers are paying less of a premium than a year ago, the average sale is 8.8% above the manufacturer's suggested retail price, or MSRP.

title: Venture capitalists urge startups to withdraw funds from crisis-laden Silicon Valley Bank
description: VC firms are urging their portfolio companies to move money out of embattled lender Silicon Valley Bank, fueling fears of a run on the tech-focused bank.

title: Silicon Valley Bank Financial in talks to sell itself after attempts to raise capital have failed, sources say
Payrolls rose 311,000 in February, more than expected, showing solid growth
description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 225,000 in February, while the unemployment rate was projected to hold at 3.4%, according to Dow Jones.

title: Silicon Valley Bank drops another 60%, weighs on the bank sector again
description: Shares of SVB Financial Group, known as Silicon Valley Bank, tumbled for a second day Friday and weighed on the whole banking sector again.

title: Arch-rivals Iran and Saudi Arabia agree to revive ties, reopen embassies in China-brokered deal
description: Iran and Saudi Arabia have long accused each other of destabilizing the region and seen one another as grave security threats, often on opposite sides of regional conflicts.

title: UK's Sunak meets France's Macron in scramble to mend relations after Boris Johnson missteps
description: Sunak and Macron are expected to flesh out agreements on migrant crossings, energy security and protecting people from the threat of Russia.

title: When it comes to passing wealth on to kids, women have very different ideas to men
description: Men and women have different approaches to wealth, and that affects how they plan to pass their money on to future generations, a new UBS report says.

title: More than $70 billion wiped off crypto market in 24 hours as bitcoin drops 8% below $20,000
description: A number of issues are weighing on cryptocurrency markets including a sell-off in U.S. stocks and issues at Silicon Valley Bank. Bitcoin fell below $20,000.

title: Many of Europe's 'golden visa' programs are closing — but demand is up in this Mediterranean hotspot
description: Greece has seen a surge in the number of people applying for its residency by investment program while other European countries call time on such programs.

title: European banking stocks sink as Silicon Valley Bank jitters spread
description: European banking stocks sold off sharply in early trade Friday as a global contagion effect took hold after shares in U.S. bank SVB Financial plunged 60%.

title: Consumer spending in China isn't surging back yet, companies say
description: China has yet to see a strong rebound in consumer spending, according to major companies.

title: A 50% rent increase? Record property demand in Dubai is creating a nightmare for some residents
description: "Believe me, there are people willing to pay the price," one real estate professional told CNBC.

title: UK economy rebounds with stronger-than-expected January GDP print
description: The U.K. economy grew by 0.3% in January, official figures showed on Friday, exceeding expectations as it continues to fend off what economists see as an inevitable recession.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Investors sold off, anxious about the monthly U.S. jobs report
description: Investors are getting noticeably jittery about February's jobs report. Markets experienced a sell off, especially in the banking sector.

title: A growing plastic smog is choking the world's oceans — and it shows no signs of slowing down
description: More than 170 trillion plastic particles weighing roughly 2 million metric tons are afloat in the world's oceans, new research reveals.

title: Shania Twain says the country music industry has regressed for women artists
description: "They're making it so difficult for women," Twain told CNBC. "They're not giving them that space."

title: Without us 'there is no Google': EU telcos ramp up pressure on Big Tech to pay for the internet
description: European telecom bosses have ramped up pressure on regulators to make digital giants shoulder some of the cost of building internet infrastructure.

title: Kuroda defends Bank of Japan's ultra-dovish stance in his final policy meeting
description: The Bank of Japan left its negative interest rate unchanged at -0.1%, widely in line with expectations.

title: China's Xi gains unprecedented third term as president
description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping gained an unprecedented third term as president of the country on Friday.

title: India's rural women are 'bearing the brunt' of climate shocks
description: The climate issue is also emblematic of the larger challenges facing India's women, observers say.

title: Sri Lanka needs institutional changes for long-term debt sustainability, says professor
description: The South Asian country is grappling with its worst financial crisis in decades and needs to unlock a $2.9 billion IMF loan that was agreed to in September.

title: Staying in British castles may be easier — and cheaper — than you think
description: Storied Collection connects travelers with historically significant castles, manor houses and hotels in the U.K. — plus details about famous former guests.

title: New York prosecutors indicate Trump criminal charges likely, report says
description: Donald Trump is being investigated for a hush money payment to porn star Stormy Daniels before the 2016 presidential election against Hillary Clinton.
